sentences.en: A method of determining retinol acetate in edible oil was established.
sentences.cn: 建立了一种测定食用油中醋酸视黄酯的检测方法.

sentences.en: A method was proposed to determine the residual ethyl acetate in AMLOX.
sentences.cn: 研究了用顶空气相色谱法测定爱罗苏中醋酸乙酯残留量的方法.

sentences.en: Acetate cellulose sheet electrophoresis and electric blotting proved it to be an α1 - globulin.
sentences.cn: 醋酸纤维膜电泳和转移电泳表明其为一种α1球蛋白.

sentences.en: Acetic acid salt : calcium acetate, sodium acetate, zinc acetate , potassium acetate.
sentences.cn: 醋酸盐系列: 醋酸钙, 醋酸钠,醋酸钾,醋酸锌, 醋酸镁等.

sentences.en: Ethyl acetate ( 71 . 41 b ) was added to the slurry in the vessel.
sentences.cn: 把醋酸乙酯 71.4 磅加到容器中的浆液内.

sentences.en: Fig. 3 Flow chart of pentosan analysis - aniline acetate colorimetric method.
sentences.cn: 图3聚戊醣分析法流程图 — 醋酸苯胺比色法.

sentences.en: Fig. 5 Variation of furfural calibration curves in aniline acetate colorimetric method.
sentences.cn: 图5醋酸苯胺比色法,糠醛标准校正线之变化.

sentences.en: He then gave them doses of caffeine and anti-inflammatories to find it blocked the acetate and relieved the headaches.
sentences.cn: 然后他给小鼠服用了咖啡因和抗炎药，意图发现这些物质是否阻断醋酸的产生，进而缓解头痛。

sentences.en: In benzene or ethyl acetate solution rates increase linearly with methyl methacrylate concentration.
sentences.cn: 在苯或乙酸乙酯溶液中其衰减速度随甲基丙烯酸甲脂浓度呈直线地增大.

sentences.en: In this paper, air oxidation synthesis of copper acetate has been studied.
sentences.cn: 介绍了在空气氧作用下,由铜屑和醋酸直接反应生产醋酸铜的方法.

sentences.en: Insoluble in water but soluble in hot ammonium acetate.
sentences.cn: 不溶于水,能溶于热的醋酸铵.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the adsorption properties of montmorillonite in chlorhexidine acetate solution.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究蒙脱石对醋酸氯己定的吸附特性.

sentences.en: Polyvinyl acetate emulsion was synthesized by semi - continuous emulsion polymerization method.
sentences.cn: 采用半连续乳液聚合的方法合成聚醋酸乙烯乳液.

sentences.en: Some models wore black straw hats traditionally used by male farmers, and many also had their waists cinched by elaborate acetate belts.
sentences.cn: 有的模特戴上传统农夫使用的黑色草帽，还有些用精心制作的醋酸纤维腰带束紧腰部。

sentences.en: St Johns Wort Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate ( vit E ), Chamomile Extract & Lavender Extract.
sentences.cn: 圣约翰草油, 维生素E, 洋甘菊 及 熏衣草萃取精华.

sentences.en: The reverse of Reaction 11 for acetate may be combined with the electron acceptor reactions.
sentences.cn: 对于醋酸盐、反应11的逆反应可以与电子接受体反应组合在一起.

sentences.en: This method is applicable in the field of butyl acetate production.
sentences.cn: 本方法适用于醋酸丁酯的生产领域.

sentences.en: Y20 is a type of re-dispersible vinyl/acetate ethylene copolymerized emulsion powder.
sentences.cn: Y20胶粉是一种可再分散的乙烯/醋酸乙烯共聚胶粉.
